custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Report_ReportDefinition WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (definitionName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {Report_ReportDefinition.*} FROM Report_ReportDefinition WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (definitionName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )
